mapper.select: SELECT T.ID ,T.TITLE ,T.DESCRIPTION ,T.LAST_UPDATED ,P.ID AS P_ID ,P.STATUS FROM TARGETS T INNER JOIN PROGRESES P ON T.PROGRESS_ID = P.ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TARGETS (ID, USER_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, PROGRESS_ID, LAST_UPDATED) VALUES (TARGET_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{progress.id}, #{lastUpdated})
mapper.update: UPDATE TARGETS SET TITLE = #{title}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, PROGRESS_ID = #{progress.id}, LAST_UPDATED = #{lastUpdated} WHERE ID = #{id}
